ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: - those who are steadfast and put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (For) those who persevere and place their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: those who remain steadfast and put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (It is they) who have exercised patience and trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who patiently endured and who rely only upon Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (They are) those who remained patient, and put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those who are patient and on their Lord do they rely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: even such men as are patient, and put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Such as are steadfast and put their trust in Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They are the ones who are steadfast and put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They are those who bear with patience, and in their Lord they trust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —those who are patient and who put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (They are) those who persevere in patience, and put their trust on their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (They are) those who remained patient (in this world for Allah's sake), and put their trust in their Lord (Allah Alone).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: such are those who are patient, and put their trust in their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who endure patiently, and in their Lord they put their trust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [They are] those who endured patiently and upon their Lord relied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:42] They are, those who endure, the harm inflicted by the idolaters and [endure] the emigration in order to make manifest the religion, and put their trust in their Lord, so that He provides for them whence they do not reckon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Such as are steadfast) towards the harm of the disbelievers (and put their trust in Allah) and not in any one beside Him; this refers to 'Ammar and his fellow believers.
